channel.title: Help for a DS
channel.description: I've added a new feature to my server, I removed clan chat and added a new tab where the clanchat icon was. How do I add text there. I've gone into my client and into the handler and it isn't showing. Help please Will REP++ Twice.

item.title: Help for a DS
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

I’ve added a new feature to my server, I removed clan chat and added a new tab where the clanchat icon was. How do I add text there. I’ve gone into my client and into the handler and it isn’t showing. Help please Will REP++ Twice.

Read full topic
